summary: FAILURE OF ELECTRONIC ABS CONTROL MODULE. GOT OUT OF VEHICLE AND NOTICED THERE WAS THE SOUND OF AN ELECTRIC MOTOR RUNNING EVEN AFTER THE IGNITION WAS TURNED OFF. FOUND OUT THAT IT IS OVER $1,000 TO HAVE FIXED. JUST SO HAPPENS THAT THE DEALER KEEPS SEVERAL OF THESE IN STOCK BECAUSE OF THE NUMEROUS FAILURES. PROBLEM WAS THAT MINE WAS OUT OF WARRANTY BY AROUND 5,000 MILES. DO YOU THINK GM WOULD OFFER TO COVER THIS... OF COURSE NOT. WHAT A JOKE.
